About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Aqib Hanief Bhat and less than 3 years ago I made a promise to myself that I'll become a web designer. I kept my promise and since January 2018 I am working as a web designer. I love every aspect of it and it totally changed my life, that's why I want share my journey from how it all started to wherever it will take me.

Programming isn’t the first thing that I’ve learned by myself, I am a former self-made Graphics Designer. I took the attitude, best ways in self-teaching and tips for constant progress in designing and applied to learning new skills as a web designer. I want to share everything I learned by myself and help people to change their lives for the better.
